cause.description:
Objectives: Raise awareness and educate key identifiers Expose the magnitude of the commercial child sex trade industry Give a voice to the vulnerable victims Partner/collaborate with government organizations and coalitions Support and enforce policies and legislation that serves to protect children from predators Create model communities for which to replicate throughout the US
The Story Behind Our Name: In 2000 Jake Collins, the founder and executive director of Tiny Stars, was working in a South American orphanage when the woman running the orphanage broke down and shared her frustrations and fears. Jake encouraged her with "The Starfish Story" to show reinforce the importance of her work. Shortly after returning to the United States in 2000, he named Tiny Stars after "The Starfish Story" to fight child trafficking and remove predators from the streets.
1. Give a voice to the vulnerable victims.
cause.mission: Tiny Stars mission is to expose and stop commercial sexual exploitation of children by catching child predators.
cause.name: Tiny Stars Organization
